item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/26/2016 - Short-Term Selloff - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/26/2016 - Short-Term Selloff - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price made a break of the short-term trend line support, signaling a potential selloff from here. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price made a break of the short-term trend line support, signaling a potential selloff from here. Technical Indicators Signals Bitcoin price had been moving above an ascending trend line on its 1-hour time frame.

item.title: Blangladesh Central Bank Hack May Be Linked To Other Attacks Around The World
item.description:
Blangladesh Central Bank Hack May Be Linked To Other Attacks Around The World

In February, Bangladesh Central Bank lost $81 million to hackers, three months after the attack, authorities have uncovered three more incidents that may be linked together, SWIFT CEO reveals plans to strengthen the security of its operations.

item.title: Slock.it Will Propose A Security Framework To The DAO
item.description:
Slock.it Will Propose A Security Framework To The DAO

Stephan Tual, COO and Co-Founder of Slock.it has revealed a new Security-oriented proposal to The DAO, the plan includes the creation of a DAO Security team, a dedicated squad of experts to create and overview a security framework to protect The DAO from all kinds of attacks.

item.title: Spain arrests 30 suspected of laundering money in bitcoin centers
item.description:
Spain arrests 30 suspected of laundering money in bitcoin centers

MADRID (Reuters) - Spanish police said on Wednesday they had arrested 30 people suspected of illegally distributing pay television content and of laundering the proceeds by investing in bitcoin "mining" centers for processing transactions in the digital currency, which use intensive computing power to generate more bitcoins.

item.title: How do I buy Ethereum from my Coinbase account?
item.description:
How do I buy Ethereum from my Coinbase account?

Partially. If you recall, a healthcare mandate existed in Massachusetts for a few years before Obamacare was attempted. So there is the possibility for states to experiment in such things. Their practical limitation, however, is that states must have balanced budgets and cannot print their own currency.

item.title: How can Bitcoin Gambling be Profitable? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
How can Bitcoin Gambling be Profitable? - NEWSBTC

Gambling is a very good way of earning extra money but is also the best way to lose all your investment. It is a form of entertainment that sets limits for the amount you are willing to risk in order to win your money back.

item.title: Kraken Details the Latest Mt Gox Creditors Meeting - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Kraken Details the Latest Mt Gox Creditors Meeting - Bitcoinist.net

The leading cryptocurrency exchange Kraken and Tokyo's court-appointed trustee has announced the current status of all Mt Gox claims have been determined. For the first time, thousands of claimants will be able to see if their claim has been accepted and will soon be processed.

item.title: Bitcoin Wrongfully Accused of Involvement in Spanish Money Laundering Scheme
item.description:
Bitcoin Wrongfully Accused of Involvement in Spanish Money Laundering Scheme

Bitcoin keeps making headlines all over the world these days, albeit not always in a positive manner. Several people in Spain have been arrested for laundering money through cryptocurrency. According to Spanish police sources, 30 people had been arrested earlier today on grounds of money laundering .

item.title: Telefonica Deal Gives 'Uber of Remittances' First Mover Advantage
item.description:
Telefonica Deal Gives 'Uber of Remittances' First Mover Advantage

According to the Australian Business Review (ABR) the firm, DigitalX has just announced it has partnered with the Latin American telco giant Telef√≥nica. DigitalX is an ASX-listed company developing the blockchain-based AirPocket app, an SMS-enabled application that aims to be the "Uber" of global money transfer.
